'''Redrot Bait''' is used in [[Fishing]]. It can be used to catch [[Stickleback]]s and its variants. The [[formula]] can be bought from [[Nantuck]] of the [[Mondstadt Fishing Association]] with 3 [[Medaka]] fishes.
